00001 #ifndef _CLUSTER_IP_H
00002 #define _CLUSTER_IP_H

00004 #include "params.h"

00006 typedef unsigned char UCHAR;
00007 typedef unsigned int  UINT;
00008 
00009 /*
00010 Message Format:   ["CINFO"]+[SEQNO]+[PRIORITY]+[ROLE]+[ACTION]+[UPTIME]+[IP]+[OPTIONAL CHECKSUM]
00011 "CINFO" 5bytes
00012 SEQNO(10bytes)
00013 PRIORITY(1byte) . P-Preferred, N- Non preferred
00014 ROLE(1byte)
00015 ACTION(1byte) - valid action (N, O, F, H)
00016 UPTIME - 10bytes
00017 IP - 10bytes ( Numeric Value not the dotted notation...).
00018 CHECKSUM(optional) - 32bytes. This will only be available if the ACTION is CHECKSUM
00019 
00020 Total Length: 38 w/o checksum,  70 with checksum
00021 */
00022 
00023 //action code
00024 const char NEGOTIATE = 'N';
00025 const char HEARTBEAT = 'H';
00026 const char ONLINE = 'O';
00027 const char MAINTENANCE = 'F';
00028 const char ACK2NEG = 'A';  // ack to negotiate request
00029 const char ACK2HB = 'B';   // act to heartbeat
00030 const char NAK = 'K';  // negative acknowledgment
00031 const char REJECT = 'R';
00032 const char SYN = 'S'; // synchronize serial number 
00033 const char SYNACK = 'Y'; // ACK to SYNC.
00034 const char RST = 'T'; // Reset. Active received unexpected seqno. Standby has to RESYNC.
00035 const char ACTIVE2MAINTENANCE='M'; // command from ACTIVE to request standby to take over...
00036 const char ACTIVE2MAINTENANCE_ACK='Z'; // ack from standby to ACTIVE2MAINTENANCE. Active will go to standby.
00037 const char ACTIVE2STANDBY='$'; // command from ACTIVE to request STANDBY to take over...
00038 const char ACTIVE2STANDBY_ACK='%'; // ack from standby to ACTIVE2STANDBY. Active will go to standby.
00039 
00040 const char CHECKSUM='E'; // send checksum of the db to peer.
00041 const char CHECKSUM_ACK='Q'; // ACK to CHECKSUM command...
00042 
00043 //role
00044 const char ACTIVE = 'M';
00045 const char STANDBY = 'S';
00046 const char UNKNOWN = 'U';
00047 
00048 //status
00049 const char ONLINE_STATUS='A';
00050 const char OFFLINE_STATUS='I'; // node unable to ping the next hop
00051 const char MAINTENANCE_STATUS='S';
00052 
00053 //states
00054 const char UNKNOWN_STATE='0';
00055 const char NEGOTIATION_STATE='1';
00056 const char UNKNOWN_TO_ACTIVE='2';
00057 const char UNKNOWN_TO_STANDBY='3';
00058 const char STANDBY_TO_ACTIVE='4';
00059 const char ACTIVE_TO_STANDBY='5';
00060 const char ACTIVE_STATE='6';
00061 const char STANDBY_STATE='7';
00062 const char MAINTENANCE_STATE='8';
00063 const char ONLINE_STATE='9';
00064 const char ACTIVE_TO_MAINTENANCE='A';
00065 const char STANDBY_TO_MAINTENANCE='B';
00066 const char CHECKSUM_STATE='C';
